div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxiiij die Augusti
anno quo Supra

The saide day patry leslie follouit and persevit thome Ridale in the tovnis nayme
for tribulance of the towne ande for dissobeing of the officiaris quhilkis he
denyit ande in continent the said action' was put to the decision' of thir
personis that is to say sere Jonhne ruthirfurd Dauid steuart Dauid andirsone
William Wormot Dauid falconar of balandrow Dauid Kintor Androw lousone
gavane murray William cheishame Dauid fynne Jonhne murray Dauid lane
Robert hile Robert scrogis and thomas straloche quhilkis chosin and suorne in
ane assis' fand the said thomas ridale quyt of the tribulance of the toune

The said day the assis' befor writin ale in ane voce concordand' fand and deliuerit
that Williame scrimgeor officiar' hede done nay wrang in the takin of
thomas Ridallis pundis

Curia Balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vicesimoquinto die
mensis Augustj Domini et cetera quingentesimo decimo

The said day Johnne litster lauchfully warnit callit and nocht comperit tile haue
ansuerit to the borgh' fundin one him be Johnne cullan' for the wranguis' withhalding
fra him of xxxij li' x s' of maile of the Inland' quhar the said Johnne duellis
et cetera Tharfor the bailyeis chargit Wilyeam scrimgeour officiar to pas' and tak ane stres'
of the said Johnne and lat it to borgh' agan to the said Johnne gif it be askit and warne
him agane this day xv dais to ansuer to the said borgh' and was secund day of proces'

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem pennultimo
die mensis Augusti Anno et cetera quingentesimo decimo

The said comperit thomas pile tailyeor with his bill of compt and rekning
betuix him and Dauid andersone anent the pament of his butht baitht maill
quhilk offerit hym reddy to compt and rekin and preif his pament of the said
butht maile and protestit that sen' the said Dauid was nocht present to heir'
the said compt suld' turne him to na preiudice

The said day Nichol baxter grantit hm awand' to mathou branche
ane barrell of Ter quhilkis the bailyeis chargit him to deliuire and
pay within terme of law siclik wan' as vthir ter was deliuerit
to marchandis of the Rais' quhilk was maid' be certane suorne personis
that the said Nichol sall deliuire the said barrell wantand' a gallone of
lekleg et cetera

The said day Patry lesly bailye commandit Wilyeame scrimgeour
officiar to pas' and warne Androu cullan again monday that nixt cummis
to comper within the tolbutht tile ansuer to the borgh' fundin one him
be the said george for him self and procuratour for Katherin prat his spous'
for the wranguis' withhalding fra thame of iiijxx merkis et cetera to compt
rekning and pament eftir the tenour of the Actis o maid obefor

The said day Wilyeame gray boll skipper grantit him to pay
to Nicholl Baxter ane full barrell of ter at his hamcuming at
this nixt Rais' betuix this and mertymes

The said day georg Bisset in lungar procuratour for Katherin prat his spous
and for him self solempnitlie protestit for his costis skathis dampnis and expensis
maid and sustenit be thame in the persecucioun' of androw cullan eftir the tenour of the
actis gane obefor And specialie apoun' Wilyeam' officiar scrimgeoure officiar'
that had failyeit in the non execucioun' of his office

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem secundo die
mensis Septembris Anno Dominj millesimo quingentesimo decimo

The said day the Bailyeis assignit the nixt hed burrow court of this burgh'
to be haldin within the tolbutht of the samyne one monunday the last day of the mo
netht of September nixt tocum till andro Cullan till ansuer to the borgh' fundin
one him be georg Bisset in lunger and Katherin prat his spous for the wranguis'
withhaldin fra thame of iiijxx markis et cetera eftir the tenour of the said borgh' fraucht
tharapone as law will

The said day Johnne balcrommy in futy grantit that he had ressauit thre laxis
persewit be ane honorable' woman the Relict' of Dauid menyeis Quhilkis the
bailyeis chargit him to Restor and pay within terme of law

The said day Willy Scrogis grantit him to freithe and releif Johnne
balcrommy of the said thre laxis quhilk the bailyeis chargit him to do
within terme of law

The saide day Alexander malisone grauntit him dettour to Richerde Waus
for xviij grils' quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay within terme of
law

The said' day the bailye chargit Robert Waus to bring gilbert
Wellis and James lidall one friday that next cumis within the tolbutht
of the said' borghe to warand him at the handis of Dauid fynne for the
maile of the said' Dauid hous

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem ixo die
mensis Septembris anno quo supra

The said' day William boll with mastir thomas chamer his forspekar exponit
and schew how that michele baldevy as adiugit be certane arbitouris to
pay him certane Some of money in abirdene the ferd day of this Instant
monetht of September and falyeing tharof to pay xx li' for costis skathis
and expens' to gidder with the rest of the saide some herfor he protestit
Solempnitlie that he mycht haue the saide xx li' with the rest of the
saide Some

Eodem die Willelmus bol fecit constituit creauit et nominauit magistrum thomam
chamer et Alexandrum gray coniunctim et diuisim suos legittimos procuratores actores factores et cetera
dans et concedens eisdem ac eorum alteri suam liberam potestatem et mandatum
speciale pro se et nomine suo ad petendum exigendum et recipienum a michale
baldevy restum summe pecunie sibi debito eum xx li' sibi promisse prout
in quodam decreto arbitrali continetur de receptis acquitandum et cetera Et
se dictum michaelem prosequendum agendum defendendum et cetera Cum
ceteris terris necessariis et oportunis Promittens de Rato et grato

The saide day Androw Wricht Come souerte tile entir patry matheris
friday that next Cumis befor the the balyeis within the tolbutht of this
burghe thar tile ansuer tile Androue brydy anent the clame of seruice
clamit be him Ande gif the said patry beis fundin seruand to the
brydie to pay him xij d' Ilkan day to the said friday for
want of his said seruand'

The saide day Jonhne litstar lauchfullie warnit callit and nocht comperit
tile ansuer to the borghe' fundin one him be Jonhne Cullane for the wrang
uis' withhaldin fra him of xxxij li' and x s' of maile eftir the tenour
of the actis maide obefor tharfor the bailye chargit Jonhne Culk
officiar' to pas' and tak ane distres fra the saide Jonhne litster
and lat it to borghe' agane and It be askit and warne him to comper
the last day of this Instant monetht of September in the hed
Court of this burghe tile ansuer to the saide borghe' as thride day
Of proces'

The saide day William makesone mylnar of the Justice myll' allegit
he hede pait vj s' and vj d' to Robert Waus in part of pament of the
maile of ane croft quhilk he grantit he had in tak of the saide
Robert and tuk to preiwe the said' money pait to the saide Robert
one friday that next Cumis

The saide day It was fundin and deliuerit be ane Suorne assis sere Johne
ruthirfurde forspekar that thai coud nocht acquit philp of Kelly for
tribulance of Johne Cuk officiar' in deid' for the quhilkis he was
in Amerciament of the court et cetera and tile amend' as law wile Ande thai coude
nocht acquit the saide Johne of tribulance of the saide philp in word'
for the quhilkis he was in Amerciament of the court and tile amende as law
wile and forber' in tyme to Cum et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xix die
mensis Septembris Anno quo supra

head.add: baxtaris conuicti et Statuti inde sequens

div.p:
The said' day gilbert tulidef Richerde redhede thome straloche
Donald' baxtar Alexander Donaldsone Johne strathachin for Androw gordon'
his mastir and Anny bucane baxtaris was accusit for the brekin
of commone ordinance In thir pontis eftir follouing that is to say In
the first for wanting of bred ale to gidder to serue and furnys' the
toune et cetera Secundlie that thai warnit nocht thar officiaris assignit to tham
to Cum and wey thar brede or It be dravn' / thridlie that thar bred kepit nocht
the pas' / ferdlie for baking of evile Stuff quhilkis thai denyit And
in continent the saide actionis was put to the decisione of ane assis' of
the best and wortheast of the toune present for the tyme quhilkis riplie avisit
the gret aithe Suorne said and deliuerit ale in ane voce concordand that thai
coud' nocht acquit ale the said baxtaris of the said' four' pontis for the quhilkis
Ilkan of tham was in foure amerciamentis of the court and tile amend as law
wile and forbeir' in tyme to Cum et cetera for the Amendis of the quhilkis It was ordanit
and deliuerit be the prouest and Consale that the said baxtaris sal stand in the goif
at the wile of the prouest and Consale And Ilkan of tham sal pay xl s' to the
vpputting of Sanct nicholes led' and the balyeis vnlaw Ande gif thai
happin' to committ ony sic defaltis and beis conuict' tharof thai salbe put in the
goyf and stand thar' xxiiij houris and Secludit the Craft foreuire

The said' day Androw lousone taxt tene Schillingis Ilkan monetht
for his maile of ane berne Occupeit be Dauid mar' et cetera protestand'
gif the saide Dauid Occupeis the saide berne eftiruart that he mycht pament
Of the said' maile and askit Instrument tharapon' befor gilbert menyeis
prouost mastir Johne badenaghe Dauid straloche and mastir Dauid nicholson'

Curia balliuorum burgj de aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vicesimo die mensis
Septembris anno quo supra
Eodem die Andreas gordone mercator amerciatur in defectu presencie

The saide day the prouest ande bailyeis chargit the foure officiaris to pas'
to giddyre compel punde ande distrenye the personis awande soumez' of mone ore
salmounde to sanct nicholes' laide eftyre the tenour of the act' maide tharapone
Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxvijo die septembris anno quo supra

head.add: the tone Is oblist to freitht gilbert menyeis of the salmond' avand for the led'

div.p:
The said' day the balyeis Consale and diuers' of the Communite present for the thane oblist
thame fathtfullie to freithe releiwe and keip gilbert menyeis prouost anent the
pament of Sex barrellis of Salmond' of the gret band' aving to briaine
Roche Inglisman of the rest of the led' bocht to the kirk thekin' et cetera and
to pay the saide sex barrellis of Salmond' to the said' giblert his ayris executoris
or assignez' at the fest of Sanct Johne the baptist Callit mydsommir nixt eftir
follouing the date of this Court et cetera

Curia Capitalis Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In
pretorio eisudem vltimo die mensis Septembris Anno dominj mille
simo quingentesimo decimo Quo die Sectis vocatis et curia
affirmata absentes patent

Thomas Dauisone
Duncanus andersone
Robertus Dauisone
Willelmus richerdsone
Thomas laisk in newburgh
lang Wat in monycabok
Andreas baxter in newburgh
Richardus Watsone
Thomas Watsone in gowillis
Thomas Wodman
Andreas Watsone in cullan
Dauid hay
georgeus Jhonnsoun'
Johannes Watsone in garntuly
Andreas gordon' mercator
Wilyeame bynne
Johannes herroun'
Robertus fraser
Alexander Tulidef
Alexander nesche
Patricius Ramsay
Dauid bannerman
Wilyeame blakhall de eodem

Eodem die gilbertus menyeis Electus fuit in officium prepositi
ture pro Anno Instanti prestito solito Juramento

Eodem die Johannes mar Jacobus colisone Andreas fif and Walterus Cullan
electj fuerunt in officium balliuorum pro Anno Instanti prestito solito
Juramento

Eodem die Willhelmus scrimgeour Normannus leslie andreas
naughtie et gilbertus prestoun' Electj fuerunt in offcium ser
geandorum pro Anno Instanti prestito solito Juramento

Eodem die compertum fuit per legittimam Inquisicionem Curie quod
Robertus stevinsone est legittimus et propinquior heres quondam Andree
stevinsone patris suj

Eodem die Robertus stevinsone filius et heres quondam Andree stevinsone
elegit fecit constituit et ordinauit andream stratoun' suum legittimum curatam
ad regendum se bona sua terras et possessiones pro suo commodo vtilitate
dummodo peruenerit ad legittimam etatem secundum Jura Regnj

The said day Androu Seygat grantit him awand' to ser Johnne
Stiruelin v bollis of malt and a half tharof ij bollis of the tua yeris
bigain of auld' det and iij bollis and a half of this yer quhilkis the bailyeis
chargit him to pay within terme of law

The said Comperit Androu Cullane and exponit how he was warnit
to this day to haue ansuerit to the borgh' fundin one him be georg bisset and
for Katherin prat his spous for the wranguis' withhaldin fra thame of
iiijxx merkis et cetera Protestit solempnitlie sen' na man' was to follow nor
persew him he mycht be quyt of the said georg chalang vnto the tyme he
be new processit

head.add: processus ministrj sancte trinitatis de terra Jacobi pyot

div.p:
Eodem die accedens ad barram religiosus frater Dauid scot procurator ministri
sancte trinitatis dicti burgj et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo red
quinque solidorum vsualis monete scocie de terra vasta Jacobi pyot Jacente in
le gren' ex australi ex australi parte eiusdem inter terram alexandrj gothra ex orientali
et terram Johannis torreleitht ex occidentali et communionem viam regiam versus
boream Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram
et lapides quos balliuis in sacculo presentauit in curia taquam secundo die
huius processus Testibus andrea mortymer Donaldo baxtar
alexandro Donaldsone et gilberto prestone sergeando

head.add: processus dominj Johannis stirueling de eadem terra

div.p:
Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Johannes stirue
ling capellanus perpetuus altaris beate Katherine virginis infra
ecclesiam perrochialem sanctj nicholaij dictj burgj Et protestatus fuit
in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu quinque solidorum vsualis monete
scocie annuatim exeuntem et leuandum de tota et integra terra Jacobi
pyot Jacente in vico viridj ex australi parte eiusdem inter terram
Alexandrj gothra ex orientali ex vna et terram quondam Johannis Tor
releitht ex occidentali partibus ab altera et communionem viam regiam ver
sus boream Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram
et lapides quos Balliuis in sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam
secundo die huius processus Testibus vt supra

head.add: processsus capellanorum de aberdene de terra dominj thome hervy

div.p:
Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Johannes Waus
collector capellanorum collegij ecclesie beati nicholaij dictj burgj Et
protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu vigintj solidorum
vsualis monete scocie annuatim exeuntem et leuandum de tota et integra
terra vasta quondam dominj thome hervy Jacnete in vico Nauium dicti burgj
ex boreali parte eiusdem inter terram quondam Andree lamyntone ex occidentali
ex vna et terram Johannis malisone ex orientali partibus ab altera et
communionem viam regiam versus austrum Ad quam terram accedens nichil
reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in sacculo
presentauit in Curia tanquam tercio die huus processus Testibus
sergeando

head.add: processus ministri sancte trinitatis de eadem terra

div.p:
Eodem die accedens ad barram frater Dauid scot procurator ministri
domus sancte trinitatis dictj burgj et protestabatur in forma Juris pro vno
annuo redditu quatuor solidorum de terra quondam domini thome hervy Jacente
in vno Nauium ex boreali parte eiusdem inter terram quondam Andree lamyntone
ex occidentali ex vna et terram Johannis malisone ex occidentali partibus ab altera
et communionem viam regiam versus austrum Ad quam terram accedens nichil
reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in sacculo presentauit
in Curia tanquam 3o die huius processus Testibus

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Johannes Waus collec
tor capellanorum collegij ecclesie parrochiali beatj nicholaij dictj burgj et protestabatur
in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu decim solidorum monete scocie vsualis
annuatim exeuntem et leuandum de tota et integra terra vasta quondam Elizibeth
Dakkyr et philippi Dunbrek Jacente in vico Inferiori dictj burgj ex
australi parte eiusdem inter terram Johnanis malisone ex occidentali terram
Andree meldrum ex orientali terram anteriorem beate Anne matris marie versus
boream et terram quondam patricij stiklar versus austrum Ad quam terram
accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos Ballivis
in Sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam 3o die huius processus Testibus vt
supra

Eodem die accedens ad Barram discretus vir dominus Johannes Waus
collector capellanorum chori ecclesie parrochialis dictj burgj Et protestabatur
in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu sex solidorum et octo denariorum
vsualis monete scocie annuatim exeuntem et leuandum de tota et integra
terra vasta quondam thome Og Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico castrj
extra portam borealem eiusdem inter terram Johannis Wilyoungson'
ex occidentali et communiones vias regias versus austrum oriens et boream
Ad quam terram accedens in defectu solucionis dictj annuj redditus nichil
reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in sacculo
presentauit in Curia tanquam 3o die huius prcessus Testibus vt supra

Eodem die accedens ad barram Religiosus frater Dauid holme subprior
et procurator prouincialis siue prioris domus fratrum carmelitatum dictj burgi et
protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu solidorum
vsualis monete scocie annuatim exeuntem et leuandum de tota et integra
terra vasta heredum quondam Ranaldi tailyeour Jacente infra dictum
burgum in vico castri extra portam borealem eiusdem inter terram
ex orientali ex vna et terra
ex occidentali partibus ab altera et communionem viam versus austrum
Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et
lapides Quos Balliuis in sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam primo
die huius processus Testibus

head.add: processus Duncanj craik de terra quondam thome frostar in futy

div.p:
Eodem die accedens ad Barram honestus vir Duncanus Craik burgensis
dictj burgj Et protestabatur in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu sex
solidorum vsualis monete scocie sibi annuatim debito et a longo tempore non
soluto de quadam terra vasta quondam Willelmi froster Jacente in futy
inter terram thome pre Bryane ex boreali ex vna et communionem viam
regiam qua Itur ad ecclesiam sanctj clementis versus Austrum et le
lynkis versus oriens Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos Balliuis in sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam
tercio die huius processus Testibus

head.add: Judicium processus magistrj Alexandri Bisset capellanis altaris sancti sanguinis de terra thome glenmalvin in futy

div.p:
Eodem die tribus processibus perlectis per magistrum Alexandrum bisset
capellanum perpetuum altaris sanctj sanguinis Jacente infra ecclesiam perrochialem
dictj burgj situati de et super recuperacione proprietatis et possessionis cuiusdam
terra vaste Jacente in futy quondam thome glenmalvin hereditarie pertinenciis
inter terram thome lamyntone ex boreali ex vna et terram altaris sancti leonardj
ex australi partibus ab altera le linkis versus oriens et maris fluxum versus
occidens in defectu solucionis vnius annuj redditus quatuor solidorum dicto altarj
annuatim debito et a longo tempore non soluto Vnde dictus magister alexander
pecijt a nobis secundum vnij formam et effectum huiusmodi suj processus Juris
et Justicie complementum sibi fierj de eadem terra cum pertinenciis Et
consequento honorabilis vir Johannes Cullane verus legittimus and Indubitatus
patronus dictj altaris ac prelocutorio nomine ipsius magistri alexandrj porrexit
plegium In manibus Normandi lesly sergeandj quos ipse magistro Alexandro
propritetatem et possessionem legittime recuperauit de dicta terra in defectu so
lucionis dictj annuj redditus Vnde hora diej legittime expectata omnibus
Interesse habentibus vocata et nullo comparente nec opponente decretum fuit
per curiam et datum pro iudicio per os Willelmi fynne Judicatoris curie quod
ipse magister alexander causam suam legittime obtinuit in Recuperacione proprietatis
dicte terre Super quibus omnibus et singulis dictus Johannes cullan patronus
et prelocutorio nomine ipsius magistrj alexandri nostras litteras testimoniales Sigillis
nostris nrs' Roborata reuerencia debita requisunt quas eidem concessimus Anno
die mense et loco prenotatis xiiijta ponitus dominj Julij dimidia prouidenti prope
secundj Anno septimo Coram prouidis et famosus viris Andrea Cullane
Duncano fif Willelmo stile Johanne collisone Juniore Dauid straloche
magistro alexandro portar domino Dauid liell et me domino Johanne stirueling clerico
communi et notaris publico
